sentences.sentence: Newly elected Greek lawmakers have been sworn into parliament, but their time in office may be short-lived. The parliament could be dissolved as early as Monday, paving the way for fresh elections on June 25th.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In the previous election held on May 21st, none of the parties managed to secure a majority under the proportional representation system. The ruling New Democracy Party secured 40.79% of the vote and fell five seats short of a majority in the 300-member chamber, with the main opposition party, CERISA, trailing behind. Despite their attempts, lawmakers failed to form a coalition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But the upcoming election will introduce a new system, offering a bonus of 25 to 50 seats to the winning party. In the meantime, the reins of the country will be in the hands of a caretaker prime minister, technocrat Iona Sarmass, who took office last Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The exceptional wave of rainfall that's been hitting Europe isn't going to mitigate the impact of a potentially dry summer across the continent, say experts.

sentences.sentence: In recent weeks, flash floods struck several countries including Croatia, Serbia and Italy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But experts say the significant amount of water that's fallen most likely won't make the soil any more fertile. One of the challenges though with rainfall, particularly very intensive rainfall after a long period of drought, is often that rain or recharge, water recharge, doesn't actually go where it needs to go because in a drought situation there's no soil moisture left in the top surface so the ground is very hard and this means when the ground is very hard that instead of the rain soaking in and recharging water levels and reservoirs and rivers it just runs straight off the land surface and leads to these catastrophic flooding events.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Experts also point out that over the past decade, droughts have become established over a shorter timescale.
